name: Noir fused glass bowl
description: These are fused glass bowls from my Noir range. This design features a black background with a streaky coloured pattern in the centre of each piece. This pattern is unique to each bowl. They measure approximately 11.5cm x 11.5cm x 1.5cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.

name: Pink and black dichroic glass necklace
description: This is a pink and black dichroic glass necklace with a subtle green patterned section down the centre. When the piece is viewed at an angle the pinky purple turns to a peachy gold. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and comes on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. Approximately 20mm x 21mm.

name: Icon fused glass bowl
description: These are fused glass bowls from my Icon range. This design features a square pattern using three different colours. Each square has a dichroic glass accent in the centre, these are unique to each bowl. They measure approximately 23cm x 23cm x 4cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.

name: Fusion Rectangle fused glass wall panel
description: These are fused glass wall panels from my Fusion rectangle range. This design features overlapping rectangles with an iridised glass accent in the centre of each piece. This lines in the corners of the panels are unique to each one and as such may be in any colours. They measure approximately 13.5cm x 8cm x each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.

name: Green and blue patterned dichroic glass bracelet
description: This is a black dichroic glass bracelet with a blue and green patterned section across the centre. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and can be unhooked at one side to wear. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. The bracelet measures approximately 5.6cm at its widest point and the glass is approximately 27mm x 24mm.

name: Fluid fused glass coasters
description:
These are fused glass coasters from my Fluid range. This design features a swirling mixture of two colours to create a random pattern which is unique to each coaster. They measure approximately 9cm x 9cm x each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
The first image shows the blue/plum colour combination. 
In the second image from left to right the colours shown are purple/blue then black/white then blue/plum.

name: Patchwork fused glass bowl
description: These are fused glass bowls from my Patchwork range. This design features a 'patchwork' of two colours in different shapes and sizes. Two sections in every bowl feature a streaky pattern which is unique to each piece. They measure approximately 23cm x 23cm x 4cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.

name: Icon fused glass wall panel
description: These are fused glass wall panels from my Icon range. This design features overlapping squares with a dichroic glass accent in the centre of each piece. This accent is unique to each panel. They measure approximately 10.5cm x 10.5cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.

name: Linea fused glass bowl
description:
These are fused glass bowls from my Linea range. This design features a lined pattern using one or three different colours. In the option for multicoloured lines, the lines may be in any combination of colours. They measure approximately 11.5cm x 11.5cm x 1.5cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
The first image shows the turquoise colour option.

name: Noir fused glass coasters
description: These are fused glass coasters from my Noir range. This design features a black background with a streaky coloured pattern over half of each item. This pattern is unique to each coaster. They measure approximately 9cm x 9cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.

name: Linea fused glass coasters
description:
These are fused glass coasters from my Linea range. This design features a lined pattern in three different colours. The colour of these lines will vary on each coaster/set - if you would like to request specific ones please contact me before placing your order. They measure approximately 9cm x 9cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
The second image shows the turquoise colour option.

name: Fusion fused glass bowl - small
description:
These are fused glass bowls from my Fusion range. This design features overlapping squares decreasing in size.  The coloured lines in the corners of the bowls are unique to each one and as such may be in any colours. They measure approximately 11.5cm x 11.5cm x 1.5cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
When ordering the first colour corresponds to the largest square.

name: Black and yellow/green dichroic glass ripple bracelet
description: This is a black dichroic glass bracelet with a yellow and green rippled section in the centre. It appears more peachy and yellow from the front, but from an angle it turns mostly green and blue. The bracelet itself is .925 sterling silver and can be unhooked at one side to wear. The glass measures approximately 31mm x 24mm and the bracelet is approximately 6cm at its widest point. It comes beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box.

name: Coloured dichroic glass stud earrings
description:
These images show dichroic glass stud earrings in different colours. They have .925 sterling silver posts and scroll backs. They measure approximately 9mm x 9mm and come beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. Please note that as the studs are made to order slight differences may occur. 
The first image shows the studs in yellow, they turn green when viewed at an angle.
The second image shows the studs in blue, these turn to a darker blue/purple at an angle.
The final image shows the studs in pink, they have a green tint when viewed at an angle.

name: Red/brown patterned dichroic glass necklace
description: This is a red/brown dichroic glass necklace with a purple and black square pattern in the centre. When viewed at an angle the piece turns to red then orange. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and comes on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. It measures approximately 17mm x 16mm and is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box.

name: Green ripple and yellow dichroic glass necklace
description: This is a green dichroic glass necklace with a ripple effect and a yellow background. When the piece is viewed at an angle the yellow turns to green. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and comes on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. Approximately 24mm x 20mm.

name: Black and brown patterned dichroic glass necklace
description: This is a black and brown patterned dichroic glass necklace with a yellow section at the side. When the piece is viewed at an angle the yellow turns green. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and comes on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. Approximately 19mm x 17mm.

name: Blue and purple dichroic glass necklace
description: This is a blue dichroic glass necklace with a purple and green patterned section in the corner. When the piece is viewed at an angle the green turns to purple. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and comes on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. Approximately 21mm x 19mm.

name: Pink and green dichroic glass cufflinks
description: This is a pair of pink dichroic glass cufflinks with a green lined stripe down the centre. The pink turns to more of a gold colour and the green turns blue when they are viewed at an angle. The cufflink backs are .925 sterling silver. They measure approximately 19mm x 18mm each and are beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box.

name: Fusion Triangle fused glass bowl
description:
These are fused glass bowls from my Fusion triangle range. This design features overlapping triangles decreasing in size. They measure approximately 11.5cm x 11.5cm x 1.5cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
When ordering the first colour corresponds to the largest triangle.

name: Linea fused glass candle holder
description:
These are fused glass tealight holders from my Linea range. This design features a lined pattern in a contrasting colour. They measure approximately 8.5cm x 8.5cm x 3cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
Each holder comes with a tealight included. The first image shows the turquoise colour option.

name: Fusion fused glass bowl - large
description: These are fused glass bowls from my Fusion range. This design features a pattern of overlapping squares in two different colours. They measure approximately 25.5cm x 25.5cm x 5cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.

name: Noir fused glass candle bridge
description:
These are fused glass candle bridges from my Noir range. This design features black glass with a streaky coloured pattern down one side. This pattern is unique to each candle bridge. They measure approximately 21cm x 14.5cm x 4cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
Each candle bridge has recessed sections for three tealights and comes with three tealights included.

name: Fluid fused glass candle holder
description:
These are fused glass candle holders from my Fluid range. This design features a swirling mixture of two colours to create a random pattern which is unique to each holder. They measure approximately 8.5cm x 8.5cm x 3cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
Each candle holder comes with a tealight included.

name: Bronze and black patterned dichroic glass necklace
description: This is a bronze dichroic glass necklace with a black patterned area at the top. When the piece is viewed at an angle the bronze colour turns to a red/orange. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and comes on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. Approximately 29mm x 18mm.

name: Deco fused glass candle bridge
description:
These are fused glass candle bridges from my Deco range. This design features black glass with two coloured stripes down each side. They measure approximately 28cm x 14.5cm x 4cm for the size to fit four candles or 21cm x 14.5cm x 4cm for the size to fit three candles. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.
Each candle bridge has recessed sections for three or four tealights and comes with three or four tealights included.

name: Iridised fused glass bowl - large
description: These are fused glass bowls from my Iridised range. This design features a black background with coloured squares down one or two sides. The gold and silver options feature squares down one side alternating between the chosen colour and a multicoloured pattern. The multicoloured option features squares down two sides in a multicoloured pattern - these are unique to each bowl. They measure approximately 23cm x 23cm x 4cm each. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly.

name: Iridised fused glass candle bridge
description:
These are fused glass candle bridges from my Iridised range. This design features a black background with coloured squares down one side. The gold and silver options feature squares alternating between the chosen colour and a multicoloured pattern. The multicoloured option features squares in a multicoloured pattern - these are unique to each piece. They measure approximately 28cm x 14.5cm x 4cm for the size to fit four candles or 21cm x 14.5cm x 4cm for the size to fit three candles. As all items are handmade the sizes and colours may vary slightly. 
Each candle bridge has recessed sections for three or four tealights and comes with three or four tealights included

name: Purple ripple dichroic glass necklace
description: This is a purple dichroic glass necklace with a ripple effect and a pink section in the centre. The purple ripples have hints of green. When the piece is viewed at an angle the pink turns to a peachy gold. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and comes on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. Approximately 20mm x 18mm.

name: Purple and turquoise dichroic glass set
description: This is a purple dichroic glass necklace and earring set with a lined effect and a turquoise section down one side. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass. The necklace comes on a .925 sterling silver curb chain and the earrings come on .925 sterling silver earwires or earclips if preferred. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. The necklace measures approximately 21mm x 17mm and the earrings are 21mm x 16mm each.

name: Pink and yellow dichroic glass bracelet
description: This is a pink dichroic glass bracelet with a yellow section in the centre. When it is viewed at an angle the pink turns golden and the yellow turns green. It is produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and dichroic glass and can be unhooked at one side to wear. It is beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. The bracelet measures approximately 5.5cm at its widest point and the glass is approximately 23mm x 22mm.

name: Fluid fused glass necklace - small
description:
These are fused glass necklaces from my Fluid range. This design features a swirling mixture of two colours to create a random pattern which is unique to each piece. They are produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and glass and come on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. They are beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. They have an average size of 18mm x 16mm but as these necklaces are handmade the sizes, shapes and mixture of the two colours will vary. If you have a preference of size, shape or colour mixture let me know and I will do my best to match this. 
The images show the purple/blue, then blue/white, then blue/plum colour combinations.

name: Fluid fused glass necklace - medium
description:
These are fused glass necklaces from my Fluid range. This design features a swirling mixture of two colours to create a random pattern which is unique to each piece. They are produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and glass and come on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. They are beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. 
They have an average size of 25mm x 23mm but as these necklaces are handmade the sizes, shapes and mixture of the two colours will vary. If you have a preference of size, shape or colour mixture let me know and I will do my best to match this. 
The images show the blue/white, then blue/plum, then purple/blue and finally black/white colour combinations.

name: Fluid fused glass necklace - large
description:
These are fused glass necklaces from my Fluid range. This design features a swirling mixture of two colours to create a random pattern which is unique to each piece. They are produced entirely from .925 sterling silver and glass and come on a .925 sterling silver curb chain. They are beautifully packaged in an RD Glass box. They have an average size of 36mm x 19mm but as these necklaces are handmade the sizes, shapes and mixture of the two colours will vary. If you have a preference of size, shape or colour mixture let me know and I will do my best to match this. 
The images show the blue/plum, then blue/white then purple/blue colour combinations.

name: Beginners fusing and slumping course
description:
This is a voucher for a beginners fusing and slumping course which can either be emailed or posted to your desired recipient. 
The course lasts 4 hours during which time you will learn all you need to know to produce simple fused and slumped items. You will come away with 2 - 3 items of your choice. The course includes all materials and use of equipment, refreshments and the postage of your finished items to you where necessary. 
The course takes place from my home workshop in Cumbria, CA13 0XY. The vouchers are valid for a year from the date of purchase. The courses can be booked at any dates and times to suit you, as long as the workshop is available.

name: Gift voucher
description:
These are gift vouchers which are redeemable against any of my products, either online or directly at any shows and events which I am attending. They make a great gift if you are not sure what to get someone - which can be very tricky for certain people!
The vouchers can either be emailed or posted to your desired recipient so please select the correct option. 
If you would like the vouchers to be sent to an address, personalised with a name or to have a special message included, please make sure to add this in the additional information box when you checkout. 
The vouchers are valid for one year from the date of purchase. Please note that these cannot be used with any other offer, although multiple gift vouchers can be used in one purchase.
